TopicTitle: How do a I save a game?

Articles.Content:
Hi

Im not talking quicksave but how do you save a game normaly? I cant find any key that links to a save menue? Even on the wiki?
Thats because there is no save. The game saves automatically. In my experience, even when the game crashes, it is still saved where i left off
It saves whenever you leave the game normally

The game saves automatically when you go back to the space center. It also does a periodic autosave as long as you're not in the middle of a burn, in order to prevent the risk of global catastrophe whenever your power goes out immediately after you've just finished doing a thirty-minute burn...
The game auto saves, but I do recommend to keep saving your ship/craft when in the VAB of Spaceplane Hanger, because the autosaves are few and far between.
